name: albumjs
description: 一个组合 vite+nestjs 的集成式框架
author: 顾弦笙/usagisah

scripts.watch:react: concurrently 'cd packages/tools && npm run watch' 'cd packages/album && npm run watch' 'cd packages/plugin-react && npm run watch' 'cd packages/cli && npm run watch'
scripts.watch:cli: concurrently 'cd packages/tools && npm run watch' 'cd packages/cli && npm run watch'
scripts.watch:react-docs: concurrently 'cd packages/tools && npm run watch' 'cd packages/album && npm run watch' 'cd packages/plugin-react-docs && npm run watch'
